meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Susan Robbins Greg Lim Kristen Senall Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4014.

div.div: (Judge Hatchett: I'm Judge Hatchett and you are in contempt of court if you don't watch Jeopardy! coming up next.)

td.p: Susan Robbins, a training and development professional from Chicago, Illinois
Greg Lim, a property manager from Austin, Texas
Kristen Senall, a first grade teacher from Buffalo, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,000)

tr.td: THE GOOD OLD U.S. OF A.
THE GRAMMYS
COUNTRY COOKING
(Alex: We want you to name the country most associated with each dish.)
AT HOME WITH THE EISENHOWERS
THE GOOD BOOK
IT'S "OK"
